'''Weathered Rocks''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], [[Sumeru]].

They are found near [[Wenut]]s. Luring the Wenut to attack from underneath a Weathered Rock will destroy the rock, revealing hidden objects or enemies.
